title: Stripe Raises New Funding That Values It at $50 Billion
description: The payments processing start-up was valued at $95 billion in 2021, but private company dealmaking has been hurt by souring global economic conditions.

title: GPT-4 Is Exciting and Scary
description: Today, the new language model from OpenAI may not seem all that dangerous. But the worst risks are the ones we cannot anticipate.

title: The Brilliant Inventor Who Made Two of History’s Biggest Mistakes
description: A century ago, Thomas Midgley Jr. was responsible for two phenomenally destructive innovations. What can we learn from them today?

title: How Siri, Alexa and Google Assistant Lost the A.I. Race
description: The virtual assistants had more than a decade to become indispensable. But they were hampered by clunky design and miscalculations, leaving room for chatbots to rise.

title: How Siri, Alexa and Google Assistant Lost the AI Race
description: The virtual assistants had more than a decade to become indispensable. But they were hampered by clunky design and miscalculations, leaving room for chatbots to rise.
